content: I'll try these steps, thanks. By the way, I just got a new phone case last week, and it's been great so far. I was getting tired of my old one, which was all scratched up. This new one is transparent with a slight purple tint, and it's been protecting my phone well. Do you have any recommendations for screen cleaners, though? I've been using a microfiber cloth, but it's not doing the best job.
